text:
Hi folks, a client is using the new “<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/object-settings/translate-custom-crm-content|Translate your CRM data>” feature (very cool)
They have several dropdown properties, so are using this to show English, French and German labels in the UI.
They also have English, German and French custom quote templates.

Even though Custom Quotes can now show <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/updates-to-enumeration-properties-in-custom-quotes-and-how-to-fetch-labels-and-internal-values?utm_medium=email&utm_content=316754057&utm_source=hs_email|enumeration property labels and internal values>, all their labels are showing in *English* even if the quote LANGUAGE is en, fr, or de.

Are CRM data translations not yet supported in quote enumeration labels?
